20110107160041.000|20110107160043.000|TR0|today, on the condition one donates a 
20110107160043.000|20110107160046.000|TR0|kidney to the other.  The governor of that 
20110107160046.000|20110107160048.000|TR0|state says the release will save the state

20110107160050.000|20110107160053.000|TR0|convicted of an $11 armed robbery back in

20110107160055.000|20110107160058.000|TR0|sentences for that crime.
20110107160058.000|20110107160100.000|TR0|
20110107160100.000|20110107160103.000|TR0|The U.S. government announced a few 
20110107160103.000|20110107160105.000|TR0|minutes ago that it is recommending lower 
20110107160105.000|20110107160108.000|TR0|fluoride levels in drinking water.  Health 
20110107160108.000|20110107160110.000|TR0|and Human Services officials say the new 
20110107160110.000|20110107160112.000|TR0|levels will still prevent tooth decay and 
20110107160112.000|20110107160115.000|TR0|over-fluoridation.  Too much fluoride can 
20110107160115.000|20110107160117.000|TR0|cause lacy, white spots on the enamel.
20110107160117.000|20110107160120.000|TR0|
20110107160120.000|20110107160122.000|TR0|And a storm may dump four inches of new 
20110107160122.000|20110107160125.000|TR0|snow on the New York City area today.  
20110107160125.000|20110107160127.000|TR0|Snow removal was slow after a blizzard 
20110107160127.000|20110107160130.000|TR0|just two weeks ago.  The city has put GPS 
20110107160130.000|20110107160132.000|TR0|trackers on some snow plows.  Officials 
20110107160132.000|20110107160134.000|TR0|are dispatching scout teams now to get 
20110107160134.000|20110107160137.000|TR0|video of the cleanup back to City Hall.

20110107160139.000|20110107160142.000|TR0|Up first, the December jobs report.  The 
20110107160142.000|20110107160144.000|TR0|unemployment rate took quite a tumble last 
20110107160144.000|20110107160147.000|TR0|month, landing at 9.4 percent.  The U.S. 
20110107160147.000|20110107160149.000|TR0|Labor Department counted 103,000 new jobs 
20110107160149.000|20110107160152.000|TR0|for December.  For 2010, the economy 
20110107160152.000|20110107160154.000|TR0|gained 1.1 million jobs.

20110107160216.000|20110107160218.000|TR0|in the unemployment rate was unusually 
20110107160218.000|20110107160221.000|TR0|large, from 9.8 to 9.4 percent.  And 
20110107160221.000|20110107160223.000|TR0|that's likely to really be the headline 
20110107160223.000|20110107160226.000|TR0|grabber of this jobs report.  But, you

20110107160228.000|20110107160231.000|TR0|

20110107160233.000|20110107160235.000|TR0|1.5 million people who weren't counted in 
20110107160235.000|20110107160238.000|TR0|this number.  I'm talking about those 
20110107160238.000|20110107160240.000|TR0|discouraged workers who aren't out there 
20110107160240.000|20110107160243.000|TR0|actively looking for work.  So that's 
20110107160243.000|20110107160245.000|TR0|something you have to consider.
20110107160245.000|20110107160248.000|TR0|

20110107160250.000|20110107160253.000|TR0|have been adding jobs, especially if you

20110107160255.000|20110107160257.000|TR0|

20110107160300.000|20110107160302.000|TR0|here.  It shows that we've added jobs for 
20110107160302.000|20110107160305.000|TR0|the first year since the recession 
20110107160305.000|20110107160307.000|TR0|started.  We added one million jobs.  It's 
20110107160307.000|20110107160310.000|TR0|actually the biggest annual gain.  And in 
20110107160310.000|20110107160312.000|TR0|2008 and 2009, you'll remember, we lost 
20110107160312.000|20110107160315.000|TR0|anywhere from three to four million jobs

20110107160731.000|20110107160733.000|TR0|Sir, just explain why.  I mean, obviously,

20110107164321.000|20110107164323.000|TR0|succeed is how we ensure that our economy 
20110107164323.000|20110107164325.000|TR0|succeeds, and all our people succeed.  
20110107164325.000|20110107164328.000|TR0|It's how we create jobs.
20110107164328.000|20110107164330.000|TR0|
20110107164330.000|20110107164333.000|TR0|And that's what has guided my 
20110107164333.000|20110107164335.000|TR0|administration for the past two years.  
20110107164335.000|20110107164338.000|TR0|Government can't guarantee Thompson Creek 
20110107164338.000|20110107164340.000|TR0|or any business will be successful.  But 
20110107164340.000|20110107164343.000|TR0|government can knock down barriers:  like 
20110107164343.000|20110107164345.000|TR0|a lack of affordable credit or high costs 
20110107164345.000|20110107164347.000|TR0|for investment or high cost for hiring.  
20110107164347.000|20110107164350.000|TR0|We can do something about that.  
20110107164350.000|20110107164352.000|TR0|Government can remove obstacles in your 
20110107164352.000|20110107164355.000|TR0|path.
20110107164355.000|20110107164357.000|TR0|
20110107164357.000|20110107164400.000|TR0|And that's why we cut taxes for small 
20110107164400.000|20110107164402.000|TR0|businesses over the last two years.  For 
20110107164402.000|20110107164405.000|TR0|example, with a tax break for hiring 
20110107164405.000|20110107164407.000|TR0|unemployed workers, Thompson Creek was 
20110107164407.000|20110107164409.000|TR0|able to grow its workforce from 200 
20110107164409.000|20110107164412.000|TR0|employees to nearly 300 employees in just 
20110107164412.000|20110107164414.000|TR0|one year.  And it took advantage of the 
20110107164414.000|20110107164417.000|TR0|tax credits that we put into place.
20110107164417.000|20110107164419.000|TR0|
20110107164419.000|20110107164422.000|TR0|We also passed a tax credit for products 
20110107164422.000|20110107164424.000|TR0|like energy-saving windows.  And that led 
20110107164424.000|20110107164427.000|TR0|to a 55 percent boost in the sales at this 
20110107164427.000|20110107164429.000|TR0|firm.
20110107164429.000|20110107164431.000|TR0|
20110107164431.000|20110107164434.000|TR0|You know, Rick was telling me that when

20110107164451.000|20110107164453.000|TR0|Take advantage of it.
20110107164453.000|20110107164456.000|TR0|

20110107164501.000|20110107164503.000|TR0|numbers released this morning reflect that 
20110107164503.000|20110107164506.000|TR0|growth.  The economy added more than 
20110107164506.000|20110107164508.000|TR0|100,000 jobs last month and the 
20110107164508.000|20110107164510.000|TR0|unemployment rate fell sharply.  Now, we 
20110107164510.000|20110107164513.000|TR0|know these numbers can bounce around from 
20110107164513.000|20110107164515.000|TR0|month to month, but the trend is clear.  
20110107164515.000|20110107164518.000|TR0|We saw 12 straight months of private 
20110107164518.000|20110107164520.000|TR0|sector job growth.  That's the first time 
20110107164520.000|20110107164523.000|TR0|that's been true since 2006.  The economy 
20110107164523.000|20110107164525.000|TR0|added 1.3 million jobs last year, and each

20110107164530.000|20110107164532.000|TR0|hiring is beginning to pick up.

20110107164552.000|20110107164554.000|TR0|because even though our economy is

20110107164559.000|20110107164602.000|TR0|through -- the worst in our lifetimes.  It

20110107165536.000|20110107165538.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  Well, first of all, why at 
20110107165538.000|20110107165541.000|TR0|that business, because this is a private,
